Mon. Apr. 16: Rally and hearing for trans nondiscrimination!
  

Dear ##first_name[Supporter]##,

The Senate calendar just came out, and its official, HB 1319 (#TransBillNH) will get a Senate Judiciary Committee hearing on Monday, April 16. Rally with us on Monday and show lawmakers that Granite Staters support fairness for our transgender neighbors and friends.

Rally and Hearing for #TransBillNH
Monday, April 16 at 12:30 p.m.
NH State House, Rm 100
107 North Main St.
Concord, NH 03303

Our ground plan and hearing strategy for that day is the same as the previous hearing. We will show our strength early with a rally outside the State House at 12:30 p.m., and then file into State House for the hearing before 1:30 p.m.

At the hearing, transgender Granite Staters and their friends, family and other allies will speak from the heart about why we must update New Hampshireâ€™s nondiscrimination law to protect all Granite Staters. Send us an email if you can testify before the Senate Judiciary Committee and tell us why you support HB 1319.

Bring the same energy and optimism you brought to the House hearing. RSVP today!

Sincerely,

Christina Gibson
Public Affairs Manager
ACLU of New Hampshire
